profile: Welcome to 365 Installation Services Inc. Call us or visit our website. We know renovations are costly and timely and that is why we value being transparent while insightful so you're able to make the best decision about your project. Get An Instant Quote www.365installation.com 365 Installation Services provides: Stairs: -New Stair Capping -Stair Recapping -Stairs Refinishing -Handrail Refinishing -New Railing & Spindles Install -Custom Two Tone Finishes Flooring: (Material and/or Installation) - Prefinished Hardwood - Unfinished Hardwood - Laminate - Engineered Hardwood - Vinyl Plank We Service All Of The GTA & Surrounding Areas Check us out here: http://www.365installation.com/ https://www.facebook.com/365InstallationServices/ https://www.instagram.com/365installationservices/ â€‹
